backend/main.mo: Motoko canister providing access-controlled CRUD for events, media-backed content sections, clubs, branding, social links, and APK URL handling.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing files, components, and tests related to GSC-verified production build flow.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of all frontend source files for reference or documentation.
frontend/docs/adsense.md: Guide explaining how to enable and configure Google AdSense using an environment variable.
frontend/docs/android-apk-from-pwa.md: Documentation on generating an Android APK from the PWA using Bubblewrap and TWA.
frontend/docs/production-deploy-google-s: Deployment guide detailing production workflow and Google Search Console verification requirements.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining OKLCH color variables and light/dark mode tokens.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry including SEO metadata, PWA tags, and Google Search Console verification meta tag.
frontend/public/ads.txt: Placeholder ads.txt file instructing users to insert their AdSense publisher ID.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app name, icons, theme colors, and display behavior.
frontend/public/robots.txt: Robots.txt allowing crawlers but disallowing /me/ paths and specifying sitemap location.
frontend/public/sitemap.xml: Sitemap listing all public site routes with change frequency and priority.
frontend/public/sw.js: Version 19 service worker implementing network-first caching and static asset pre-caching.
frontend/scripts/run-prod-build-with-gsc: Runs the production frontend build, logs output, checks for the dist directory, and verifies the Google Search Console meta tag before deployment.
frontend/scripts/verify-gsc-meta.ts: Validates that the built dist/index.html contains the exact required Google Search Console verification meta tag, exiting with errors if missing.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Defines the main React router structure, mapping all public and admin routes to their respective page components.
frontend/src/components/admin/MediaPicke: Media picker allowing image/video selection, validation, preview, and upload progress handling.
frontend/src/components/AdminGuard.tsx: Protects admin routes by redirecting non-admin users to the login page and showing an access denied message.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with dynamic social media links, quick navigation links, and a share button with clipboard feedback.
frontend/src/components/HomeBottomNavMen: Provides a mobile bottom navigation menu using a sheet UI, allowing quick navigation based on current route state.
frontend/src/components/InstallPromptBan: Shows a PWA install prompt banner when installable, allowing users to install the app or dismiss the prompt.
frontend/src/components/SettingsSheet.ts: A settings panel that manages theme switching, sharing the site URL, PWA install, and APK downloads.
frontend/src/components/TopNav.tsx: Top navigation bar with branding, navigation links, mobile menu, sharing, user session handling, and settings access.
frontend/src/config/branding.ts: Provides default logo path and a helper to derive the logo URL from branding data.
frontend/src/config/navLinks.ts: Defines primary navigation links and a utility to determine the user-specific 'Me' link based on admin status.
frontend/src/config/publicSite.ts: Exports the shared public site URL constant.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminSession.ts: Zustand store for admin login/logout with persisted session storage.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, exposing identity state and login/clear actions.
frontend/src/hooks/usePwaInstallPrompt.t: Hook for handling PWA install prompts, tracking installability, dismissal, and installation state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and updating branding, history content, membership registrations, and clubs via an actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/useTheme.ts: Provides a theme state hook with light/dark toggling and persistence.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind layers and CSS variables for light and dark themes along with base typography and layout styles.
frontend/src/layouts/AppLayout.tsx: Defines the root layout with top navigation, routed content, and footer.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query client and Internet Identity providers and imports global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders a public About page with organization story, mission, vision, and values sections.
frontend/src/pages/AdminAboutPage.tsx: Admin interface for viewing, editing, adding, and removing About sections with media support.
frontend/src/pages/AdminAndroidApkPage.t: Admin page to view and update the Android APK download URL with validation and status messages.
frontend/src/pages/AdminBrandingPage.tsx: Provides an admin interface to load, edit, and save branding media such as the organization logo with success and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/AdminClubsManagerPage: Implements CRUD management for clubs, including forms for creating and editing club details and a confirmation dialog for deletions.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Displays the main admin dashboard with navigation links to branding, home, about, and other management tools, plus a logout button.
frontend/src/pages/AdminEventsManagerPag: Allows admins to create, edit, and delete events with form validation, success/error messaging, and date-time handling.
frontend/src/pages/AdminHistoryEditorPag: Loads and edits the organization's history text and media, providing save functionality with loading and success indicators.
frontend/src/pages/AdminHomePageEditorPa: Provides an admin interface to view, edit, add, and remove home page sections, saving updates via API mutations.
frontend/src/pages/AdminLoginPage.tsx: Renders the admin login form, handling authentication, navigation, and error states.
frontend/src/pages/AdminMembershipReview: Displays a list of membership registrations for admins with loading, error, and empty states.
Allows admins to view and update social media link URLs with save feedback and validation states.
frontend/src/pages/ClubDetailPage.tsx: Fetches and displays details for a specific club with loading, error, and not-found handling.
frontend/src/pages/ClubsPage.tsx: Displays a list of clubs with loading, error, and empty states and links to individual club pages.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Shows contact methods including email, phone, address, and office hours using styled cards.
frontend/src/pages/EventsPage.tsx: Fetches and lists upcoming events with formatted date/time and handles loading, error, and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/HistoryPage.tsx: Loads and displays organizational history content with optional media and fallback states.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with hero content, dynamic sections from backend, and navigation actions.
frontend/src/pages/MembershipRegistratio: Provides a membership registration form with submission handling, success state, and admin login link.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPolicyPage.tsx: Renders the Privacy Policy page with scrollable sections detailing data collection, usage, and disclosure.
frontend/src/pages/ProgramsPage.tsx: Displays a grid of youth programs with icons, descriptions, ages, schedules, and a call‑to‑action section.
frontend/src/pages/TermsOfServicePage.ts: Renders the Terms of Service page with scrollable sections outlining terms, licenses, conduct, and membership rules.
frontend/src/utils/adsense.ts: Injects the Google AdSense script into the document head once using a Vite environment client ID.
frontend/src/utils/media.ts: Provides media file validation, conversion to Uint8Array, preview URL helpers, and type-checking utilities.
frontend/src/utils/seo.ts: Updates canonical and Open Graph URL meta tags based on the current route path.
frontend/src/utils/share.ts: Shares a URL using the Web Share API with clipboard and textarea fallbacks when unsupported.
frontend/src/utils/theme.ts: Manages storing, applying, and initializing light/dark theme selection using localStorage.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage support and hash-based routing handling.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom color system via CSS variables, extended typography, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing frontend/backend architecture, requested UI changes, known issues, and existing features for planning and fixes.
